title: vegetable_plot_water_tank_refill_solar_pump
summary: Refilling water storage tank for vegetable plots during midday using solar-powered pumping.
description: This record documents the refilling of a water storage tank in the vegetable plot zone. The operation was performed during midday when solar power from panels was available to drive the water pump. Outside the 10:00â€“15:00 window, electrical power is required for both pumping and farm data system operations, so water was prepared and stored in advance.

operation_context.system_constraint: limited electrical availability outside solar generation hours
